remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此类是为了能够创建完全支持数据绑定、更改通知、属性无效和其内容动画的自定义集合类型。This class is provided to enable the creation of custom collection types that fully support data binding, change notification, property invalidation, and animation of its contents. ### System.windows.freezablecollection 的 XAML 用法XAML Usage for FreezableCollection 支持有限的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 语法。 supports a limited [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. - 作为根对象的对象元素，你可以在理论上指定一个不受约束的 对象元素，该元素还必须指定 [x:TypeArguments 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive) 以声明约束。As an object element at the root, you can theoretically specify an unconstrained object element, which must also specify the [x:TypeArguments Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive) to declare the constraint. 但是，这不是一种常见方案，因为为此， 必须是根元素。However, this is not a common scenario, because to do this, the must be the root element. 存在此限制的原因 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 是，中的处理器实现 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 仅支持 [x:TypeArguments 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive) ，而它所设置到的元素是根元素，如果要在中实例化泛型类型，则必须在任何开放式约束泛型上使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。This limitation exists because the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] can only support [x:TypeArguments Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-typearguments-directive) when the element it is being set on is the root element, and you must use on any open constraint generic if you want to instantiate a generic type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 不太可能需要将 作为根元素，甚至是松散 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。It is unlikely that you want a as the root element, even as loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. - 如果派生自 并在派生集合中应用类型约束，则派生集合可以支持各种用法。If you derive from and apply a type constraint in the derived collection, the derived collection can support a variety of usages. 这是可能的，因为派生的约束不再需要通过。This is possible because the constraint in your derivation eliminates the need to pass . - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]此类派生集合的典型用法是通过隐式集合语法。The typical [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage for such a derived collection is through implicit collection syntax. 支持某些接口的集合不需要将集合本身指定为对象元素。Collections that support certain interfaces do not need to specify the collection itself as an object element. 有关中的集合语法的详细信息 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，请参阅 [XAML 语法详述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail)。For details on collection syntax in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail). 例如 *，如果对象的属性的*类型为受约束的类型 *，则该\*\*对象* 可能支持以下语法：For instance, an *object* with a *property* where the *property* was of type constrained by could support the following syntax: ``` ``` - 只要不隐藏无参数的构造函数，派生的集合也可以支持对象元素语法 (其中对象元素是显式的，而不是上面显示的隐式用法) 。As long as you do not hide the parameterless constructor, the derived collection can also support an object element syntax (where the object element is explicit, as opposed to the implicit usage shown above). 它不需要是根元素。It does not need to be the root element. 或者，您也可以使用派生集合作为根元素，而无需指定，尽管使用集合作为根元素的情况并不常见。Or, you can also use the derived collection as a root element, without needing to specify , although using a collection as a root element is uncommon. - 在上述任何一种情况下，集合中的任何子元素都必须为实现的约束的类型或由指定。Any child elements of the collection in either of the above scenarios must be of the type of either the implemented constraint, or as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作在指定集合上执行浅表复制;仅复制对集合的元素的引用，而不克隆元素本身。This operation performs a shallow copy on the specified collection; only references to the collection's elements are copied, the elements themselves are not cloned. 修改新的元素 还会修改该的元素 `collection` 。Modifying an element of the new also modifies that element for `collection`. 元素按照 指定集合的枚举器读取的顺序放置在新的中。The elements are placed in the new in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the specified collection.

summary.span: 如果此集合（或其内容）具有经过动画处理的依赖项属性，则会复制属性的基值，但不会复制其经过动画处理的当前值。

span.span: If this collection (or its contents) has animated dependency properties, the property's base value is copied, not its current animated value.

span.span: A modifiable copy of this collection and its contents.
The copy's value is .
